title: Emmerdale spoilers: Cain sleeps with Kerry
text:
Cain Dingle’s (Jeff Hordley) not in a good place in Emmerdale right now — what with him having discovered that wife Moira (Natalie J Robb) has been having a steamy affair with farmhand Nate (Jurrell Carter) behind his back — and, in the coming episodes, he ends up sleeping with Kerry Wyatt (Laura Norton)!

In spite of everything that’s transpired, Moira is refusing to give on her marriage, and thus she arrives up at Butlers farm to tell Cain that she’s moving back in. He’s not best pleased to hear her news, but an emotional Moira does her best to explain what motivated her to have the affair in the first place. However, Cain’s not moved by her words.

Moira kisses Cain, and he doesn’t pull away at first, but it doesn’t take long for him to come to his senses, and thus he orders her out of the farm once more.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Moira refuses to take no for an answer, but as she storms out, Casin hardens — his love evidently turning to hate.At the Woolpack, Kerry (Laura Norton) flirts with Cain and the pair share a moment.

Later, Moira’s determined to move back to Butlers so that she can fight for her marriage, but — upon her arrival — she walks in on Cain with Kerry — something which leaves her utterly devastated.

Cain’s clearly pleased that Moira’s upset — but is this really the end of the once-happy couple’s relationship?

What’s more, could Cain and Kerry’s one night stand blossom into romance?

Advertisement Advertisement
description: But will romance ensue? Or is Cain simply trying to get back at Moira?
